db:abstract.db:para: Load and display several JSON models.
This documentation was introduced in QtCanvas3D 1.0.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app
QT += qml quick
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/canvas3d/$$TARGET INSTALLS += target
SOURCES += main.cpp
RESOURCES += qml.qrc
OTHER_FILES += doc/src/* \ doc/images/*
EXAMPLE_FILES += \ 3dmodels.txt \ readme.txt
